content:
Hello everyone, just a small heads up. If you want to propose a different PR to the one you have already proposed on a task, you need to first comment withdraw PR #old_PR_number on the issue first. This will unlink the previous PR. Then this can be followed up by a subsequent comment propose PR #new_PR_number.

Also, please note that the there is a single space between PR and the number #xyz
Maybe it is worth updating CONTRIBUTING.md with these notes.
I think it's already in there, but I will check it again.
There is an instruction on how to withdraw a PR, but not the remark that this is a necessary prior step to proposing a new PR.
I added a step 6 which clarifies how to propose a new PR instead of an old one. I'll also add a clarification about the space. EDIT: now the clarifications are bulleted sub items.
Terence Tao has marked this topic as resolved.
